name: super-search
description: ### Super Search is an app that allows users to search for movie information related to any comic book character using api data from [ComicVine](https://comicvine.gamespot.com/api/) and [TheMovieDB](https://developers.themoviedb.org/3/getting-started/introduction). I created this app because I am a fan of all things comic book related and want to help people who enjoy the Marvel and DC movie characters discover new ways to enjoy them.
